app_descript:
Infinite Design

Brief: Infinite Design offers a professional vector graphics experience right on your mobile device. Tailored for artists and designers, this app brings an array of superior tools, an efficient streamlined interface, and impressive advanced features together to help users create intricate designs and graphics with ease.

  • ğŸ“ Perspective Guides: Draft elaborate 3D cityscapes with five different perspective guides, allowing for sophisticated architectural designs. ğŸ™ï¸
  • âœï¸ Advanced Tools: With the pen, text, and shape tools, unleash your creativity in any dimension you desire. The transform tool adds versatility with options like translate, scale, rotate, flip, distort, and skew. ğŸ› ï¸

Please note that the community section is not included as the app is not a game.
